sentence: What did the clock say to the class? stopwatch youre doing!
explanation: A stopwatch is a device used to measure the amount of time elapsed from a particular time when activated to when it is deactivated.
first_new_sentence: I used a stopwatch during the race to measure my performance.
second_new_sentence: The instructor set the stopwatch to count down for the exam, ensuring all students had the same amount of time.
